title: "Fascination Hypnosis: Types, Techniques, and History"
first_phrase: In the previous section, we explored the specific state of hypnosis known as hypnosis of fascination. We delved into its history, the animal kingdom, and the mechanics behind this type of hypnosis. Now, in this final part, we will look into different types of fascination hypnosis, including the use of fascination as a pre-induction technique and as a facilitator for therapy during difficult moments such as crises. We will also discuss how fascination can be used to understand personality types and how it relates to Ericksonian hypnosis.

last_phrase: In conclusion, hypnosis of fascination is a powerful tool that has been used for centuries in various forms. From animal behavior to human therapy sessions, its effects on the mind and body are truly fascinating. Keep exploring and practicing to discover the full potential of hypnosis of fascination.
